en.title: Desert Slots RPG
en.welcomeMessage: Welcome to the cursed desert. Spin the wheel of fate to survive.
en.blackMarketDesc: Purchase equipment (Common to Epic) via gambling at the Black Market; you can buy up to two items. Proceed with caution!
en.pyramidPassage: You stand in a dimly lit chamber within the pyramid, torchlight flickering on the walls...
en.pyramidDirLeft: The stone door on the left
en.pyramidDirRight: The stone door on the right
en.hintBattle: You sense a murderous intent nearby...
en.hintDust: A cloud of dust rises in the distance.
en.hintRoar: A terrifying roar echoes across the dunes.
en.hintFootprints: You see strange footprints in the sand.
en.hintMonster7: The wind carries the scent of a beast.
en.hintPowerful: An overwhelming pressure crushes the air.
en.hintGiantShadow: A colossal shadow blocks the sun.
en.hintDeepRoar: The ground trembles from a deep roar.
en.hintElite3: You hear the sound of heavy armor.
en.hintElite4: A veteran of many battles is near.
en.hintElite6: This enemy is not like the others.
en.hintElite7: A champion of the desert stands guard.
en.hintElite9: Silence... the calm before the storm.
en.hintTemple: You see the ruins of a temple.
en.hintTerror: You are seized by sudden terror.
en.hintMiniBoss2: The leader of the pack is here.
en.hintMiniBoss8: The path is guarded by a giant.
en.hintCaravanBells: You hear the faint sound of bells.
en.hintTent: You spot a tent in the distance.
en.hintSpices: The smell of exotic spices drifts by.
en.hintGreen: You see a patch of green.
en.hintPalms: Palm trees are visible on the horizon.
en.hintOasis2: Birds are flying towards the east.
en.hintSandstorm: The wind is picking up speed.
en.hintWindSound: A howling wind drowns out all sound.
en.hintDarkSky: The sky turns brown with dust.
en.banditLootRecovered: ğŸ’° Recovered loot from bandits: {gold} gold!
en.bloodline_trigger_pct: Bloodline trigger: inflicts {pct}% burn per turn on the enemy (lasts {duration} turns)
en.bloodline_trigger_range: Bloodline trigger (range value); shown value is locked at generation
en.test_character_select_desc: Choose your path for this test run.
en.battle_luck_evaded_corpse_poison: ğŸ² Battle luck activated â€” avoided corpse poison!
en.blackMarketMet: Encountered the Black Market merchant: gamble for equipment from Common to Epic; up to two purchases.
en.blackMarketError: (System error: Black Market interface not loaded)
en.foundEquipmentOnBody: You found equipment on the body.
en.travelerNothing: The traveler had nothing of value.
en.travelerDecayed: The body is too decayed to search.
en.caravanRestMet: You arrived at a caravan rest stop.
en.boughtPotions: ğŸ§ª You bought 2 potions from the caravan (cost 60 gold)
en.caravanNoGold: The merchants refuse to trade with you.
en.caravanGiftGold: The caravan leader gifts you gold.
en.nomadGiftItem: The nomads gave you a parting gift.
en.potionBroken: A potion bottle broke in the struggle.
en.scorpionNest: You fell into a scorpion nest!
en.scorpionTreasure: You found loot in the nest.
en.godCurse: You have been cursed by the god.
en.pyramidDanger: The air inside is stale and dangerous.

en.evt_js_events_story_js_113: ğŸª You met a lost caravan!
